org.apache.hadoop.security
Class KerberosName

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.hadoop.security.KerberosName

public class KerberosName
extends Object

This class implements parsing and handling of Kerberos principal names. In particular, it splits them apart and translates them down into local operating system names.

setConfiguration

public static void setConfiguration(Configuration conf)
                             throws IOException
Set the static configuration to get the rules.

IMPORTANT: This method does a NOP if the rules have been set already. If there is a need to reset the rules, the setRules(String) method should be invoked directly.

Parameters:
conf - the new configuration
Throws:
IOException

setRules

public static void setRules(String ruleString)
Set the rules.

Parameters:
ruleString - the rules string.
